oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: UNICEF tour - Australia - 1972 - part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part one of a 1972 UNICEF fundraiser tour performance in Australia. Featuring Tex Ritter (host) and Glenn Barber (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tex Ritter; Glenn Barber
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) [Unidentified] introduces the show and Tex Ritter as master of ceremonies -- (00:22) Opening theme -- (00:38) Tex Ritter thanks the audience and introduces Skippy the kangaroo -- (01:23) Ritter talks and jokes about the kangaroo -- (02:00) Ritter talks about the generosity of the people of Australia -- (02:53) Ritter talks about Texas, Alaska, and how big Australia is -- (03:45) Ritter introduces Glenn Barber, who is also from Texas -- (04:29) Glenn Barber thanks the audience and introduces the first tune -- (04:49) Don't Worry 'Bout The Mule (Just Load The Wagon) [Glenn Barber] -- (07:20) Barber thanks the audience and their love of country music -- (07:49) Barber talks and introduces the next tune -- (08:49) Honey (Glenn Barber) -- (10:08) Barber talks about Willie Nelson and introduces the next tune -- (11:15) Touch Me (Glenn Barber) -- (12:30) Barber talks and introduces the next tune -- (13:10) My Woman, My Woman, My Wife (Glenn Barber) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: UNICEF.; Ritter, Tex; Ritter, Tex, 1905-1974; Barber, Glenn;
